query_result.query:
-- A query to generate Nimbus application contexts in JSON format for the
-- purpose of testing client targeting.
--
-- The existing app contexts used by the Nimbus Rust SDK are shaped like this:
--
-- pub struct AppContext {
--     pub app_name: String,
--     pub app_id: String,
--     pub channel: String,
--     pub app_version: Option<String>,
--     pub app_build: Option<String>,
--     pub architecture: Option<String>,
--     pub device_manufacturer: Option<String>,
--     pub device_model: Option<String>,
--     pub locale: Option<String>,
--     pub os: Option<String>,
--     pub os_version: Option<String>,
--     pub android_sdk_version: Option<String>,
--     pub debug_tag: Option<String>,
--     pub installation_date: Option<i64>,
--     pub home_directory: Option<String>,
--     #[serde(flatten)]
--     pub custom_targeting_attributes: Option<HashMap<String, String>>,
-- }

WITH randomish_sample AS
(
    SELECT 
        "fenix" AS app_name,
        "org.mozilla.firefox" AS app_id,
        client_info.app_channel AS channel,
        client_info.app_display_version AS app_version,
        client_info.app_build AS app_build,
        client_info.architecture AS architecture,
        client_info.device_manufacturer AS device_manufacturer,
        client_info.device_model AS device_model,
        client_info.locale AS locale,
        client_info.os AS os,
        client_info.os_version AS os_version,
        client_info.android_sdk_version AS android_sdk_version,
        NULL AS debug_tag,
        UNIX_SECONDS(PARSE_TIMESTAMP('%F%Ez', client_info.first_run_date)) AS installation_date,
        NULL AS home_directory,
        NULL AS custom_targeting_attributes,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY client_info.locale) AS rowno,
    FROM 
        org_mozilla_firefox.baseline
    WHERE 
        DATE(submission_timestamp) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
        -- grabbing @ 100 samples here to ensure we get enough to LIMIT to 20 later
        AND RAND() < 100/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM org_mozilla_firefox.baseline WHERE DATE(submission_timestamp) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)) 
), app_contexts AS (
    -- Stripping out the rowno, which is used to ensure we don't have duplicate locales
    -- so that we can match the AppContext object schema
    SELECT
        app_name,
        app_id,
        channel,
        app_version,
        app_build,
        architecture,
        device_manufacturer,
        device_model,
        locale,
        os,
        os_version,
        android_sdk_version,
        debug_tag,
        installation_date,
        home_directory,
        custom_targeting_attributes
    FROM
        randomish_sample
    WHERE
        rowno <= 1
)

SELECT 
    TO_JSON_STRING(t) AS app_context
FROM 
    app_contexts AS t
LIMIT
    20
